page.title: 05FARMING CONTINUED
page.content: NEW STREET FARM GR 641 629 There is a large field,green and newly cut.Hedgerows separate the fields.On the right there are two large oak trees.On th horizon there is a wood.The fields are used for grazing cattle.On the left there is a small building like a cottage.There are also fields of horses,fields of rape and trees.There is a mixture of old and modern houses,old barns and cottages. The Old Barn was built in the nineteenth century.It is made of wood,bricks,tiles and it holds bales of straw.We also saw Chads Farm,Keepers Cottage and Orchard Cottage. NORTHDOWN FARM GR 622 659 At Northdown Farm they have 200 warren chickens.they lay up to 12 dozen eggs a day.The eggs are sold to markets.
